summary: A female parole officer sheds her inhibitions as she begins a torrid affair with the man responsible for the death of her best friend.
cast: Angie Everhart|Richard Grieco|Kevin Fry|Elizabeth Barondes|Ray Valenti|McKayla Matthews|David Jean Thomas|Ken Palmer|Julian Christopher|Paul Oliver|Yvonne Farrow|Lee Ryan|Gabriella Hall|Rory Knox Johnston|Francine York|Ralph Spector|Tina Tyler|Roy Abramsohn|Michael Samluk
title: Last Cry
